author: jochembrouwer
content: Hi all, EIP 2537 did get an update which did 2 big things: (1) it removed some precompiles and (2) it changed the gas schedule. However, these files: https://eips.ethereum.org/assets/eip-2537/test-vectors point to old test vectors. The gas is not updated and the removed precompiles are still there. Could this be updated? ðŸ™‚

author: jochembrouwer
content: The data for these test vectors is located here: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/tree/master/assets/eip-2537

author: jochembrouwer
content: I'll open a PR for this

author: jochembrouwer
content: If another EL client could also run these test files to verify those are correct, that would be great. EthJS passes BLS tests on the latest pectra tests release and that version is also used to modify those files, so this should be correct
